name: Myself (iDunnyX)
description:
Fight through the inner thoughts of our main character as he struggles to find the strength to fight his inner demons. From the time he wakes up to the time he goes to bed there is an unseen battle inside himself.

A/D to move

Space to Jump

*This is a super rough prototype of an idea I wanna see if I should progress further*

**I used my depression as a building block for the idea. When it comes to depression I want people to know they aren't alone and do not have to feel weak because they are experiencing this**

***Remember always reach out for help:

Loved ones

Trained professionals

Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1-800-273-8255 ***

This is a topic very near and dear to my heart.
